verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David אַ֭שְׁרֵי <WH835> Blessed מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <WH7919> [is] he that considereth אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּ֑ל <WH1800> the poor בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> him in time רָ֝עָ֗ה <WH7451> of trouble יְֽמַלְּטֵ֥הוּ <WH4422> will deliver יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD יִשְׁמְרֵ֣הוּ <WH8104> will preserve וִֽ֭יחַיֵּהוּ <WH2421> him and keep him alive [יֶאְשֹּׁר כ] (וְאֻשַּׁ֣ר <WH833> call ק) בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וְאַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּ֝תְּנֵ֗הוּ <WH5414> and thou wilt not deliver בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> him unto the will אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> of his enemies

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD יִ֭סְעָדֶנּוּ <WH5582> will strengthen עַל־ <WH5921> upon עֶ֣רֶשׂ <WH6210> him upon the bed דְּוָ֑י <WH1741> of languishing כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִ֝שְׁכָּב֗וֹ <WH4904> all his bed הָפַ֥כְתָּ <WH2015> thou wilt make בְחָלְיֽוֹ׃ <WH2483> in his sickness

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <WH589> I אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> I said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> LORD חָנֵּ֑נִי <WH2603> be merciful רְפָאָ֥ה <WH7495> unto me heal נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> my soul כִּי־ <WH3588> for חָטָ֥אתִי <WH2398> for I have sinned לָֽךְ׃
אוֹיְבַ֗י <WH341> Mine enemies יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> speak רַ֣ע <WH7451> evil לִ֑י מָתַ֥י <WH4970> When יָ֝מ֗וּת <WH4191> of me When shall he die וְאָבַ֥ד <WH6> perish שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> and his name

וְאִם־ <WH518> and when בָּ֤א <WH935> And if he come לִרְא֨וֹת ׀ <WH7200> to see שָׁ֤וְא <WH7723> vanity יְדַבֵּ֗ר <WH1696> [me] he speaketh לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> his heart יִקְבָּץ־ <WH6908> gathereth אָ֥וֶן <WH205> iniquity ל֑וֹ יֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> to itself [when] he goeth לַח֣וּץ <WH2351> abroad יְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> he telleth

יַ֗חַד <WH3162> together עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against יִ֭תְלַחֲשׁוּ <WH3907> me whisper כָּל־ <WH3605> All שֹׂנְאָ֑י <WH8130> All that hate עָלַ֓י ׀ <WH5921> Against יַחְשְׁב֖וּ <WH2803> against me against me do they devise רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> my hurt לִֽי׃

דְּֽבַר־ <WH1697> disease בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <WH1100> An evil יָצ֣וּק <WH3332> [say they] cleaveth fast בּ֑וֹ וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> when שָׁ֝כַ֗ב <WH7901> unto him and [now] that he lieth לֹא־ <WH3808> not יוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> no more לָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> he shall rise up

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> friend שְׁלוֹמִ֨י ׀ <WH7965> Yea mine own familiar אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom בָּטַ֣חְתִּי <WH982> in whom I trusted ב֭וֹ אוֹכֵ֣ל <WH398> which did eat לַחְמִ֑י <WH3899> of my bread הִגְדִּ֖יל <WH1431> hath lifted up עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against עָקֵֽב׃ <WH6119> [his] heel
וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God חָנֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> be merciful וַהֲקִימֵ֑נִי <WH6965> unto me and raise me up וַֽאֲשַׁלְּמָ֥ה <WH7999> that I may requite לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

בְּזֹ֣את <WH2063> I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> By this I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because חָפַ֣צְתָּ <WH2654> that thou favourest בִּ֑י כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יָרִ֖יעַ <WH7321> doth not triumph אֹיְבִ֣י <WH341> me because mine enemy עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> over

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I בְּ֭תֻמִּי <WH8537> me in mine integrity תָּמַ֣כְתָּ <WH8551> And as for me thou upholdest בִּ֑י וַתַּצִּיבֵ֖נִי <WH5324> and settest לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> me before thy face לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵֽ֭הָעוֹלָם <WH5769> from everlasting וְעַ֥ד <WH5704> against הָעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> and to everlasting אָ֘מֵ֥ן ׀ <WH543> Amen וְאָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> and Amen
